        • jsymbolic2.features.NumberOfGraceNotesFeature

  • public class NumberOfGraceNotesFeature
extends MEIFeatureExtractor
    Obtain all of the grace notes of a particular MEI piece through the MeiSpecificStorage class from the See jMei2Midi dependency software.

    • Method Detail

      • extractMEIFeature

        public double[] extractMEIFeature(org.ddmal.jmei2midi.meielements.meispecific.MeiSpecificStorage meiSpecificStorage,
                                  javax.sound.midi.Sequence sequence,
                                  MIDIIntermediateRepresentations sequence_info,
                                  double[][] other_feature_values)
        Extract the number of grace notes of the specified mei music.
        Specified by:
        extractMEIFeature in class MEIFeatureExtractor
        Parameters:
        meiSpecificStorage - The storage that holds all accessible mei specific data.
        sequence - The MIDI sequence that this mei feature corresponds to. Notice that this can be taken directly from the MeiSequence.
        sequence_info - The jSymbolic intermediate reprentation for MIDI information.
        other_feature_values - The values taken from the other features.
        Returns:
        The number of grace notes from the specified piece. This can be found in the first and only index of the returned double array.
